name: intelgraph-platform

scripts.test:ci: pnpm run test:jest && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:smoke:backend && npm run test:smoke:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.persisted:check: node scripts/graphql/build_persisted_map.js client/src/queries /tmp/queries.json && diff -q /tmp/queries.json services/api/persisted/queries.json || (echo 'Persisted query map drift'; exit 1)
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.ci: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test

test_commands: pnpm run test:jest && pnpm run test:e2e
npm run test:smoke:backend && npm run test:smoke:frontend
build_commands: npm run build:client && npm run build:server

name: policy

scripts.test: vitest run && NODE_TEST=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--loader ts-node/esm node --test tests/policy-engine.test.js

test_commands: vitest run && NODE_TEST=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--loader ts-node/esm node --test tests/policy-engine.test.js

name: maestro

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint

test_commands: npm run compile && npm run lint

name: intelgraph-client

scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:vitest

test_commands: npm run test:jest && npm run test:vitest

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
npm run clean && npm run build && npm test

name: intelgraph-platform

scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

test_commands: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
build_commands: npm run build:client && npm run build:server

scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

scripts.dev:worker: cross-env NODE_ENV=development CONDUCTOR_ROLE=worker WORKER_PORT=4100 nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'node --loader ts-node/esm' src/conductor/worker-entrypoint.ts
